author: Fextralife
description:
No Rest for the Wicked THE BREACH Tips - Beginner Guide
Check out NRFTW’s biggest update yet - The Breach: https://rebrand.ly/35f198 
Sponsored by: Moon Studios

No Rest for the Wicked was released as an Early Access title back in April 2024 and has gained some attention being a new action RPG game from Moon Studios who created the much beloved Ori series. Whether you are a new player interested in checking out the game or a returning player you will have to start over with the latest  Breach update and today we will be talking about the tips and tricks that will help as you start your wicked Journey.  

Timestamp
0:00 - No Rest for the Wicked Gameplay The Breach Beginner Guide
0:36 - Turn On the Enemy Poise Bar
1:03 - Gather All the Resources You Find
1:41 - Start the Construction Projects ASAP
2:07 - Do Bounties and Challenges
2:43 - Enchanting can be a double edge sword
3:21 - Spells and Runes
4:05 - Healing Aura Spell
4:37 - Durability and Repair Spell
5:13 - Stat Allotments When
title: No Rest for the Wicked THE BREACH Tips - Beginner Guide
